DOC.brief_title: Non Invasive dP/dt Detect Acute Ischemic Myocardial Dysfunction Emergency Department
DOC.detailed_description: For patient chest pain , ECG remain important initial risk assessment tool . Myocardial ischemia infarction highly likely patient significant ST segment change ECG elevation myocardial marker necrosis . Identification high-risk patient difficult non ischemic ECG negative marker presentation . One sensitive index contractility rate increase intraventricular pressure isovolumetric contraction , ( leave ventricular dP/dt arterial dP/dt ) . Dp/dt ( dP/dt ejc ) represent rate change pressure ejection . It show cardiac contractility dP/dt decrease acute myocardial ischemia . We theorize high value dP/dt would find non ischemic chest pain ischemic chest pain ischemia reduce myocardial contractility , whereas chest pain non cardiac origin increase dP/dt stress pain . The current study describes noninvasive plethysmographic dP/dt change patient present emergency department acute chest pain , could add diagnostic triage ischemia ED , thus decrease number unnecessary admission .
DOC.criteria: age 18 year old Chest pain last less 12 hour traumatic chest pain arrythmias STEMI
